title: Solus 4.4 Returns With Refreshed Desktop Experience
description:
Solus 4.4 Harmony makes a triumphant return with enhanced user experiences, performance improvements, and updated software stacks.

The post Solus 4.4 Returns With Refreshed Desktop Experience appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Lightweight Distro Q4OS 5.2 ‘Aquarius’ Is Out Based on Debian 12
description:
Based on Debian 12 “Bookworm,” Q4OS 5.2 “Aquarius” brings the latest KDE Plasma 5.27 LTS desktop environment.

The post Lightweight Distro Q4OS 5.2 ‘Aquarius’ Is Out Based on Debian 12 appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Wayland Support for Budgie Desktop Looks Bright, Even for Budgie 10
description:
The upcoming Budgie 11 desktop environment will be Wayland-only and will not support an X11 session. Learn more here.

The post Wayland Support for Budgie Desktop Looks Bright, Even for Budgie 10 appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Fedora 40 Plans to Trample User Privacy With Telemetry Integration
description:
In a surprising proposal, Fedora plans to implement a telemetry tool in next year’s Fedora 40 Workstation release. Learn more here.

The post Fedora 40 Plans to Trample User Privacy With Telemetry Integration appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Canonical Removes LXD From Linuxcontainers.org’s Care
description:
After spending eight years as a Linux Containers project, Canonical says it wants to bring the LXD project back home to Ubuntu.

The post Canonical Removes LXD From Linuxcontainers.org’s Care appeared first on Linux Today.
